titleStmt.title: The follies of France, or, A true relation of the extravagant rejoycings that were made by the French King's command, in most cities of France, for the pretended death of His Majesty (William, King of Great-Britain) contained in a letter written from a Roman Catholick citizen of Paris (by way of Holland) to his correspondent in London ; translated from the French original.
titleStmt.author: Roman Catholick citizen of Paris.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
